original_text: But his bow abode in strength, and the arms of his hands were made strong by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob; (from thence is the shepherd, the stone of Israel:)
korean_text: 요셉의 활은 도리어 굳세며 그의 팔은 힘이 있으니 이는 야곱의 전능자 이스라엘의 반석인 목자의 손을 힘입음이라

sentences.original_text: But his bow abode in strength,
and the arms of his hands were made strong
by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob;
